Realising that you're being followed, and not wanting to be inadvertently shepherded into a trap that might be lying up ahead, you stand your ground and turn to face the direction of your pursuers.

One of these is larger than the others, and, although [npc2.her] wings look large enough to sustain flight, [npc2.sheIs] choosing to walk upon the ground, while the other three, smaller imps, are fluttering along in the air a short way behind.
